basic.description: As the initial course in accounting, this course provides a foundation of accounting knowledge necessary to the fuller appreciation of many aspects of business. The structure of the process of accounting is studied, with particular emphasis on the use, interpretation, and communication of financial information.
basic.subject: COMM
basic.title: Financial Accounting

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite     Level 2 or above.
Exclusion: COMM111.
NOTE    This course is not available to students enrolled in the Commerce Program.
